H0.text: Sinology is the study of the language, history and culture of which country. Japan

H1.text: Sinology is the study of the language, history and culture of which country. Korea

H2.text: Sinology is the study of the language, history and culture of which country. Vietnam

H3.text: Sinology is the study of the language, history and culture of which country. 中国

A4.text: Sinology, also referred to as China studies, is a subfield of area studies or East Asian studies involved in social sciences and humanities research on China.

A5.text: It is an academic discipline that focuses on the study of the Chinese civilization primarily through Chinese language, history, culture, literature, philosophy, art, music, cinema, and science.
